product_name: Century Twist-N-Grill Portable Charcoal Grill - 18" - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The Century Twist-N-Grill Portable Charcoal Grill lets you take your grilling on the road. From tailgating, to beach barbecues, to the campsite, this 18 in. grill is ready to cook up some tasty grub. 18 in. grill surface area allows ample room to spread food out; grill surface height adjusts for just the right cooking temperature. Bottom air vents let you controll grill temperature. Rotating bowl is height adjustable; remove the bowl (and the grill surface) for easy transport and storage. Heavy-duty stamped steel construction; sturdy, removable support legs; carry handles. Closeout.
short_description: The Century Twist-N-Grill Portable Charcoal Grill lets you take your grilling on the road. From tailgating, to beach barbecues, to the campsite, this 18 in. grill is ready to cook up some tasty grub.
